casebody.data:
In the Matter of T.R.P. No. 629A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2005. Robert W. Ewing, Winston-Salem, for Renee Browe. Elizabeth Martinson, for Ronnie Parks. Sherrie Hodges, Jefferson, for Guardian ad Litem.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of December 2005 by Petitioner (Wilkes County DSS) for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Petitioner (Wilkes County DSS) shall have up to and including the 27th day of December 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of December 2005."
